mapper.select: SELECT K.BOOK.NAME, BOOK_PICTURE, BOOK_PFILE, B.REVIEW_TITLE, B.REVIEW_DATE FROM BLOG B, BOOK K WHERE (B.BOOK_ISBN = K.BOOK_ISBN) AND B.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BLOG (BLOG_ID, MEMBER_ID, BOOK_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_RATING, REVIEW_CNT) VALUES (blog_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{book_id}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, sysdate, #{review_rating}, #{review_cnt})
mapper.update: UPDATE BLOG SET REVIEW_CNT = REVIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE BLOG_ID = #{blog_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * RANK() OVER(ORDER BY REVIEW_CNT) AS RV FROM BLOG) AS VIEWED WHERE VIEWED.RV <= 4
SELECT COUNT(*) AS N FROM BLOG WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

SELECT k.book_picture, k.book_pfile, b.review_title, b.review_date FROM blog b JOIN book k USING (book_id) WHERE review_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR review_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
